Graph Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select Graph from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to plot data on a waveform graph.

This pane includes the following components:

  • Legend?—Specifies whether to display the legend for a graph.
  • Waveform Graph—Plots the data on a waveform graph.
